pr_title: [shelly] Support for Shelly Button 1, ix3, Dimmer 2, Door Window 2, Gas, Vintage; support for CoIoT V2 (firmware 1.8+)

timeline.message:
Break-up CoAP handler into V1 decoding, V2 decoding and general
decoding. This allows to support CoAP V1+V2 at the same time. The
version tag from the CoAP Optoons will be used to dynamically switch to
V2 (V1 is default to support older firmwarte releases). CoAP V2 is part
of firmware release 1.8. #8197 fixed.

Signed-off-by: Markus Michels <markus7017@gmail.com>
